resources.string: To capture photos and videos, allow Medley access to your camera.
To capture photos and videos, allow Medley access to your device\'s photos, media, and files.
To capture photos and videos, allow Medley access to your device\'s photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn \"Files and media\" on.
To add a contact via QR code, allow Medley access to your camera.
To share videos, allow Medley access to your device\'s photos, media, and files.
To share videos, allow Medley access to your device\'s photos, media, and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn \"Files and media\" on.
Minimum two characters required for First Name
Minimum two characters required for Last Name
